>
[Potion of Resistance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=192)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Drinking this thick, fortifying potion grants resistance against a single damage type for 1 hour. Each _potion of resistance_ is created to defend against acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage (and is called a _lesser potion of fire resistance_ or the like).
